contentrichtext.text: The '''Ontario Medical Association''' is a [[professional organization]] for [[physicians]] in [[Ontario]], [[Canada]] founded in 1880. It represents and, to a certain degree, governs approximately 24,000 physicians in Ontario. The association's main office is located at 150 Bloor Street West in [[Toronto]]. The current president is Dr. Doug Weir. <ref>https://www.oma.org/Spotlight/Pages/DrStewartKennedy.aspx </ref> The chair of the anaesthesiology section is Dr. Jim Watson. The chair of the Section on Emergency Medicine is Dr. Myron Haluk. <ref>http://www.thestar.com/news/canada/article/1222917--second-senior-says-she-had-cataract-surgery-without-sedation-at-oakville-trafalgar-hospital</ref> ==See also== *[[Professional Association of Internes and Residents of Ontario]] *[[College of Physicians and Surgeons of Ontario]] == References == {{Reflist}}[https://www.oma.org/Spotlight/Pages/ Ontario Medical Association - Physician Spotlight] ==External links== *[http://www.oma.org/ Ontario Medical Association WebLink] *[http://www.ontariosanesthesiologists.ca/ Ontario's Anesthesiologists] [[Category:Medical associations based in Canada]] {{med-org-stub}} [[Category:Organizations based in Ontario]] [[Category:Organizations established in 1880]]
